RV.name: Research Value
RV.description: Novel knowledge contribution? Falsifiable? Fills gap in literature?

EV.name: Engineering Value
EV.description: Practical utility? Cognitive load reduction? Adoptability?

PV.name: Philosophical Value
PV.description: Deepens understanding? Connects disciplines? Intellectual rigor?

PrV.name: Product Value
PrV.description: Increases adoption? Commercial viability? Network effects?

EdV.name: Educational Value
EdV.description: Teaches concepts? Reshapes pedagogy? Transfers expertise?

top_20_ranked.title: Experiment 1: Single-Point Failure Recovery
top_20_ranked.rationale: GO/NO-GO decision on entire resilience narrative. Core claim validation: Can single-point failures be recovered autonomously? YES → publication viable. NO → pivot to 'enabling architecture'.

top_20_ranked.title: Empirical Validation Paper: When Self-Healing Architectures Actually Heal
top_20_ranked.rationale: Proves or disproves core claims simultaneously. Data from all experiments (recovery, cascade, events, cognitive load). Top-tier venue. Definitive publication.

top_20_ranked.title: Experiment 2: Cascade Prevention (Fault Localization)
top_20_ranked.rationale: When component A fails, what % of B, C, D are affected? Validates isolation claim. Could reveal critical coupling problem.

top_20_ranked.title: Formalize Consciousness as Temporal Logic Property
top_20_ranked.rationale: Anchor claim. Falsifiability gate. Can consciousness be fixed-point of self-observation? Without temporal logic spec, claim is unfalsifiable and unpublishable.

top_20_ranked.title: Systems Theory Synthesis Paper: From Biology to Software Lifecycle Patterns
top_20_ranked.publication_venue: OOPSLA, ECOOP, Transactions on Software Engineering
top_20_ranked.rationale: Grand synthesis. Unifies Clusters I-III. Maps biological development → software architecture. Citation magnet. Intellectually rigorous.

top_20_ranked.title: Separate Consciousness Concerns from Core Component Pattern
top_20_ranked.rationale: Architectural clarity. DDD principle: consciousness is cross-cutting concern, not domain property. Component core stays clean. Enables reasoning about true domain logic.

top_20_ranked.title: Model Consciousness as Explicit Domain Aggregate
top_20_ranked.rationale: If consciousness is domain concept, what are invariants, repositories, policies? Unblocks property-based testing (Rank 16). Completes DDD picture.

top_20_ranked.title: Property-Based Testing Framework (jqwik/QuickCheck)
top_20_ranked.rationale: Generate 1000s random transition sequences; assert invariants hold. Could identify bugs in state machine. Standard best practice, high impact on test coverage.

top_20_ranked.title: Cognitive Load A/B Test: Do Biological Metaphors Help Learning?
top_20_ranked.rationale: Quick falsifiable experiment. Validates core pedagogical assumption: metaphor → faster learning. Quick user study (50 developers, 2-3 weeks). Publication venue: CHI, ICSE.

top_20_ranked.title: Cognitive Load Quantification (Developer Study with Metrics)
top_20_ranked.rationale: Baseline metric for all cognitive work. Measures task completion time, error rate, retention. Drives Rank 21 attribution + Ranks 22-25 refactoring ROI.

top_20_ranked.title: Formalize DDD Bounded Contexts Explicitly (Context Map)
top_20_ranked.rationale: What are true domain boundaries in Samstraumr? DDD agent found 5 conflated domains. Create context map. Foundation for domain modeling (Rank 9).

top_20_ranked.title: Complete ConsciousnessLoggerAdapter Implementation (Currently 30% Done)
top_20_ranked.rationale: BLOCKING ITEM. Prevents all consciousness work. 767 lines exist; 7 feature files incomplete. Complete implementation, write tests, validate. 2-4 weeks.

top_20_ranked.title: Performance Benchmark Suite (JMH Microbenchmarks + Macrobenchmarks)
top_20_ranked.rationale: Baseline latency, throughput, memory, CPU. Unknown performance characteristics currently. Enables informed optimization decisions. Publication data.

top_20_ranked.title: Smart Linter: Architecture + Consciousness Invariants Enforcement
top_20_ranked.rationale: Maintains 98.8% compliance automatically. Prevents architecture violations. Custom linter rules (no outbound imports, consciousness invariants, state rules). Publication venue: ICSE Tools.

top_20_ranked.title: Specify Port Contracts in Formal Language (Z, Alloy, TLA+)
top_20_ranked.rationale: 12 ports exist with natural-language specs only. Formalize preconditions/postconditions. Enables test generation + contract verification. Foundation for Rank 15.

top_20_ranked.title: Measure Actual State Transition Coverage (Not JaCoCo Line Coverage)
top_20_ranked.rationale: JaCoCo says 80% line coverage. Actual: ~25% transition coverage (tested ~15-20 of 729 possible transitions). Reveals blind spots for Rank 16.

top_20_ranked.title: Attribute Cognitive Burden to Specific Components (Root Cause Attribution)
top_20_ranked.rationale: Which design elements cause most burden? Component.java (35%), State Machine (30%), Tests (15%), Consciousness (10%), Tooling (10%). Guides Ranks 22-25 refactoring.

top_20_ranked.title: Comparison Article: Samstraumr vs. Microservices/Actors/DDD/Clean Architecture
top_20_ranked.publication_venue: ACM Queue, IEEE Software, O'Reilly, DZone
top_20_ranked.rationale: When should teams choose Samstraumr? Comparison article helps practitioners decide adoption. Positioning piece, not research, but high product value.

top_20_ranked.title: Education Outcomes Paper: Metaphors Improve Learning in Architecture Education
top_20_ranked.publication_venue: SIGCSE, ITiCSE, IEEE Transactions on Education
top_20_ranked.rationale: Do biological metaphors improve learning outcomes? Educational impact validation. Novel pedagogy. Could reshape software engineering education broadly.

top_20_ranked.title: Implement Autopoiesis (Maturana-Varela) as Formal Model
top_20_ranked.rationale: Can Samstraumr's self-observing architecture be mapped to autopoiesis? Biological theory rigor. Either validates alignment or admits metaphor is decorative.

phase_1_foundation_weeks_1_5.description: Unblock all downstream work by completing prerequisites
phase_1_foundation_weeks_1_5.gate_4_checkpoint: Week 4 — Consciousness formalization complete? (If no → revise philosophy)

phase_2_validation_setup_weeks_6_12.description: Build measurement infrastructure and run quick experiments
phase_2_validation_setup_weeks_6_12.gate_8_checkpoint: Week 8 — Cognitive load baseline showing promise? (If no → skip refactoring)

phase_3_critical_experiments_weeks_12_20.description: Run three high-stakes experiments that validate core claims
phase_3_critical_experiments_weeks_12_20.gate_15_checkpoint: WEEK 15 — CRITICAL: Does Experiment 1 (recovery) work? (YES → publication viable. NO → pivot to 'architecture enabling recovery')

phase_4_publication_weeks_16_plus.description: Write and submit papers across multiple venues

critical_gates.outcome_no: Revise philosophical approach; may need to pivot to 'consciousness as observability' instead of 'consciousness as computation'

critical_gates.decision: Is cognitive load baseline showing promise?
critical_gates.outcome_yes: Invest in refactoring (Ranks 22-25); Rank 20 data guides priorities
critical_gates.outcome_no: Skip refactoring; focus on other value dimensions (research, philosophy)

critical_gates.decision: Are bounded contexts + consciousness aggregate sound?
critical_gates.outcome_no: Rethink domain structure; may need different context boundaries

critical_gates.decision: Do experiments show recovery works? (Experiment 1 — GO/NO-GO)
critical_gates.outcome_yes: Core resilience narrative is publication-viable. Proceed to Rank 42 (empirical paper)
critical_gates.outcome_no: CRITICAL: Pivot narrative to 'architecture that enables recovery' (developers implement). Still publishable but different positioning. Adjust Rank 42.

critical_gates.decision: Do experiments 2-3 validate isolation + event semantics?
critical_gates.outcome_yes: All core assumptions validated. Proceed to publication phase with confidence
critical_gates.outcome_no: Some assumptions fail. Rank 42 must acknowledge limitations; still publishable but less conclusive

tier_1_must_have.description: Non-negotiable foundation. Without these, all downstream work fails.

tier_2_should_have.description: Validates core claims. Without these, research is incomplete.

tier_3_nice_to_have.description: Increases elegance & impact. Without these, value is missed.

tier_4_optional.description: Polish and completeness. Not essential to core value.
